name: Untitled.jpg The Game
description:
Navigate your trusty paintbrush across your desk, joining together different colors of paint to complete your art!

Use your mouse to move the paintbrush and pick up paint blobs. Colors will combine to make new colors, but make sure you don't accidently touch your artwork with the wrong color. Luckily, you have a water dish to clear unwanted paint off your brush.

  • Use the mouse to control the paintbrush
  • Touch colored paint to pick up that color
  • Touch the water dish to clear your brush color
  • Move the paintbrush over blank artwork to add color
  • Be sure not to add the wrong colors!
  • Which colors go on which artwork? You'll have to figure it out!

Music: Wallpaper by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4604-wallpaper

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
